content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
─────────────────────
### Copper Cable Factory at Position(≈2.5, 17.5)
Consists of the following entities:
– Cable factory input chest at Position(x=2.5, y=17.5)
– Burner inserter (new factory) at Position(x=2.5, y=16.5)
– Burner inserter at Position(x=1.5, y=17.5) (fuel: coal)
– Burner inserter using direction RIGHT at Position(x=3.5, y=17.5)
– Assembling machine (“assembling-machine-1”) at Position(x=1.5, y=19.5)
– Additional burner inserter at Position(x=0.5, y=21.5) (status: NO_FUEL)
– Auxiliary chest at Position(x=1.5, y=21.5)

### Depot Belt System at Position(3.5, 15.5)
Consists of the following entities:
– Wooden chest (belt depot) at Position(x=3.5, y=15.5)
– Dedicated transport belt segment at Position(x=4.5, y=15.5)
– Depot burner inserter (using direction UP) at Position(x=3.5, y=14.5)

### Extraction System at Position(–3.5, 27.5)
Consists of the following entities:
– Wooden chest (buffer) at Position(x=–3.5, y=26.5)
– Extraction system burner inserter at Position(x=–3.5, y=27.5) with drop position Position(x=–3.5, y=28.5)

### Electricity Generator at Position(–0.5, 24.5)
Consists of the following entities:
– Steam engine (generator) at Position(x=–0.5, y=24.5)
– Boiler at Position(x=–5.5, y=24.0)
– Offshore pump at Position(x=–7.5, y=25.5)
– Connection burner inserter at Position(x=–3.5, y=23.5)

### Smelting Facility at Position(≈–3.0, 19.0)
Consists of the following entities:
– Stone furnace at Position(x=–3.0, y=19.0) (producing iron-plate)
– Stone furnace at Position(x=–4.0, y=21.0) (producing copper-plate)

### Research Lab 
Consists of the following entity:
– Lab with lab_input {‘automation-science-pack’: 17}, electrical_id 7106, and status NO_POWER
  (Position not specified)

### Isolated Wooden Chest at Position(–4.5, 18.5)
Consists solely of the single wooden chest entity likely from a failed depot placement attempt.

ERROR TIPS
────────────
• Errors connecting transport belts:
 – Multiple connection attempts (Steps 210, 211, 213, 214, 215, 216, and 217) failed with the message “Transport belts cannot be connected directly to a Prototype.SteamEngine object…”. 
  Tip: Always use an inserter to input items into a steam engine and verify the target entity’s type before attempting a belt connection.

• Errors placing wooden chests due to distance constraints:
 – An attempt (Step 212) to place a wooden chest at Position(3.5,15.5) failed because the target was too far (distance 15.89 exceeds max distance 10).
  Tip: Move closer to the target location before attempting to place the entity.

• Undefined variable error:
 – A NameError (“target_chest” is not defined) occurred (Step 212).
  Tip: Ensure all variables are properly defined and referenced, checking for typos or misnamed identifiers.

• Inventory shortage errors during placement:
 – An attempt (Step 213) to place a wooden chest failed due to “No wooden_chest in inventory.”
  Tip: Confirm that the required item is available in inventory before making a placement call.
